ygData.subject: Galvatron to Darkfate
ygData.msgSnippet: Galvatron sent a comm top darkefate. Darkefate. I await your signal. When you reach 3/4 the way here I will make my distraction that will allow the maximals

Subject: Galvatron to Darkfate

--part1_b7.b9e8ece.27c407cb_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

 Galvatron sent a comm top darkefate. "Darkefate. I await your signal. When 
you reach 3/4 the way here I will make my distraction that will allow the 
maximals and alliance to flank them on the right and you come from the left 
surronding them. The destrons will support the back so they have no escape."

--part1_b7.b9e8ece.27c407cb_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  COLOR="#000080" SIZE=2 FAMILY="SCRIPT" FACE="Lucida Handwriting" LANG="0"><B> Galvatron sent a comm top darkefate. "Darkefate. I await your signal. When 
<BR>you reach 3/4 the way here I will make my distraction that will allow the 
<BR>maximals and alliance to flank them on the right and you come from the left 
<BR>surronding them. The destrons will support the back so they have no escape."</B></FONT></HTML>
